# Adept Mastery (Feat)
## Overview
You are talented at mastering the intricacies of spells you cast.

**Prerequisite:** Int 17+, [[Spell Mastery (Feat)|Spell Mastery]].

**Benefit:** You may double the number of spells you master every time you choose the [[Spell Mastery (Feat)|Spell Mastery]] feat.

**Normal:** You gain a number of mastered spells equal to your Intelligence modifier.

**Special:** N/A

**Source:** Path of Magic (Fantasy Flight Games), pg. 77
